Entropy Strike.name: Entropy Strike
Entropy Strike.flavor: A ruinous attack ravages an enemy and delays its ability to recover from its injuries.
Entropy Strike.trigger: You hit an enemy with a melee weapon attack.
Entropy Strike.effect: The attack deals 1[W] extra necrotic damage, and the target cannot regain hit points or gain temporary hit points until the end of your next turn.

Hasten the End.name: Hasten the End
Hasten the End.flavor: Your weapon turns black when it strikes and causes your target to dissolve before your eyes.
Hasten the End.trigger: You hit an enemy with a melee weapon attack.
Hasten the End.effect: The enemy takes 2[W] extra damage, and it takes ongoing 20 necrotic damage (save ends). If any of this damage reduces the enemy to 10 hit points or fewer, it dies.

Doomlord’s Advance.name: Doomlord’s Advance
Doomlord’s Advance.flavor: Reality decays at your word, letting you slip through time and space in an instant.
Doomlord’s Advance.effect: You teleport up to 5 squares, and the space you leave becomes a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Creatures in the zone or adjacent to it take a -2 penalty to attack rolls and saving throws.

Entropic Harbinger.name: Entropic Harbinger
Entropic Harbinger.flavor: Dispatching an enemy releases entropic forces to rend and ruin your foes.
Entropic Harbinger.trigger: You reduce a nonminion enemy to 0 hit points.
Entropic Harbinger.effect: You activate an aura 2 that lasts until the end of your next turn. Enemies in the aura cannot regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.
